long_description: Make a meal that is the envy of the whole campground with the lightweight, compact Camp Chef Everest 2-burner stove. It's ready for road trips and family camping adventures. Features 2 burners that each kick out 20,000 BTUs to get your cooking done in short order; separate burner controls let you boil noodles and slowly warm sauce at the same time. Piezo igniter sparks the stove to life with a push of the button, eliminating worries about wet matches and burning your hand. Lid and side shields block wind from the burners. Stainless-steel drip tray is easy to clean up. Convenient carry handle makes it easy to transport the Camp Chef Everest 2-burner stove. Operates on 16.4 oz. propane canisters, sold separately. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: Make a meal that is the envy of the whole campground with the lightweight, compact Camp Chef Everest 2-burner stove. It's ready for road trips and family camping adventures.
